subtitleNullable: 220 people with skin problems rated 3-4 stage on the IGA scale, acne dataset
descriptionNullable:
# Skin Disease Classification dataset
Dermatology dataset includes 686 photos and suitable for the the neural network to identify problem areas of the skin on the face by the IGA scale . The neural network will be used in hospitals and will automate the routine work of dermatologists.

# 💴 For Commercial Usage: To discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset, leave a request on **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/dermatology?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=skin-problems-34-on-the-iga-scale)** to buy the dataset

# Content

228 people with skin problems rated 3-4 stage on the IGA scale took 3 selfies: frontal, two-thirds to the left, and two-thirds to the right.

All photo are taken in good lighting, with no cosmetics, glasses, masks, or foreign objects on the face. 

# 💴 Buy the Dataset: This is just an example of the data. Leave a request on **[https://trainingdata.pro/datasets](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/dermatology?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=skin-problems-34-on-the-iga-scale)** to discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset.

# **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/dermatology?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=skin-problems-34-on-the-iga-scale)** provides high-quality data annotation tailored to your needs.
